A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
As a movie is entertaining\, I certainly laughed in some parts and has unforgettable scenes.
Spoilers ahead! As a Star Wars movie\, it sucks too much. With a Luke Skywalker totally wasted and twisted badly.
While the Star Wars films have been a reference for directors and artists of all kind\, and others are copied or winked at Star Wars in some way\, in this episode VIII they are copied badly\, from other films that although are good\, they are not Star Wars. You can find references and copies of Matrix scenes\, Star Trek\, Harry Potter\, Hunger Games\, The Neverending Story among others ... They are not winks\, or easter eggs to those movies\, they are cheap copies. It's sad that they do that to what was Star Wars.
Not to mention that they do not respect their own new characters ... The characters do not find surprises\, the surprises are for the fans\, and they are unpleasant surprises to watch.
This is not Star Wars. It's entertainment\, it's visually well-made\, but it's not Star Wars ...
